revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Aruba Networks |model=AP-224 |revision=(APIN0224) |series=AC1750 |upc=700615001880 |asin=B00JJ5EZ9E;US; |fcc_date=05/17/2013 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=enterprise access point |fcc_id=Q9DAPIN0224225 |ic_id=4675A-APIN0224225 |pcb_id=48RNAW04.SGD |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Freescale |cpu1_model=P1020 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, |wi1_module=Wistron NeWeb DNXB-M5I |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43460 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=Wistron NeWeb DNXB-M2I |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43460 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Vitesse |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand=Vitesse |eth_chip3_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AP-220 Series Wireless Access Point}} :IAP-224 ''w/ external antennas''
This FCC ID applies to the APIN0224 (removable antennas) :and the APIN0225 (integral antennas).
"[G]48RNAW04.SGD" and "PCB P/N: 2010169D REV: 01" :is silkscreened on the main board ([[Wistron NeWeb]]). "(C)2012 ARUBA NETWORKS" and "PCB P/N: 201017G REV: B" :is silkscreened on the top of the blue wireless module. "[G]48DNXB0E.SGB" is silkscreened on the bottom. {{see also|Aerohive AP230|Motorola Solutions AP 7532}} The SoC and RAM is shielded in the FCC photos.
{{WiFiCert|WFA19427|07/18/2013}}
